title: Get Tax Return Transcript for Mortgage Application
description: A taxpayer is applying for a mortgage and the lender requires official IRS transcripts of their last two tax returns.

tasks.description: Gather the taxpayer's information and the specific tax years needed.
Access the IRS 'Get Transcript' online tool on behalf of the taxpayer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs in to the IRS portal.

tasks.description: Download the tax return transcripts for the required years and provide them to the taxpayer to give to their lender.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully obtains and delivers the official IRS documents.
